meanings.definition: A meal or gathering at which meat, fish, or other food is cooked out of doors on a rack over an open fire or on a portable grill.
meanings.sent1: We had a fun barbeque in the park with friends last weekend.
meanings.sent2: The family enjoyed a delicious barbeque in the backyard on a sunny day.
meanings.sent3: The barbeque in the forest attracted hungry bears looking for a feast.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the barbeque filled the neighborhood, tempting everyone to join.
meanings.sent5: The sizzling sound of the barbeque made mouths water in anticipation.

meanings.definition: A grill or fireplace used for cooking food over an open fire.
meanings.sent1: Dad set up the barbeque in the backyard to cook burgers for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The barbeque at the campsite was perfect for roasting marshmallows.
meanings.sent3: The tiny barbeque in the corner of the garden looked adorable.
meanings.sent4: The barbeque glowed in the evening, casting a warm light around.
meanings.sent5: The crackling flames of the barbeque added a cozy feel to the night.
